entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Showers after midnight. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:14 PM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 3.
